item.title: Prince Andrew to Be Stripped of His Royal Title
item.description: The extraordinary move caps his fall from grace over his ties to the convicted sexual predator Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Thieves Steal More Than 1,000 Items From Oakland Museum of California
item.description: A robbery this month targeted Indigenous baskets, jewelry and other artifacts from a storage facility of the Oakland Museum of California.
